DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effectiveness of two airway clearance techniques; Intrapulmonary Percussive Ventilation and Assisted Autogenic Drainage in hospitalized infants under the age of 2 with acute viral bronchiolitis.
DOC.brief_title: The Effectiveness of AAD and IPV to Treat Hospitalized Infants (<2years) With Acute Viral Bronchiolitis.
DOC.criteria: first period of wheezing Wang score between 3 and 7 age < 24 months Sa02> 90% ICU patients mechanical ventilation use of antibiotics use of corticosteroids gestational age < 34 weeks chronic cardiac or pulmonary disease no parental consent
